trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Shawnee
There were no other sightings in Shawnee on or around August 19th 2012
Summary: 4 bright red orange lights. 1 lead the other followed behind about 20 seconds in triangle formation
divs: Sighting DetailsOn my balcony with girlfriend saw 1 very bright orange light moving under cloud cover from n to west. Seconds later three more followed in triangle formation. Could have been a Helicopters but I haven't seen something like that move in the sky. No noise but we were about a mile away. Could be a million explanations but never seen anything like it. Though I will say I've seen a LOT of military craft in the sky the. Last few days so my guess they were some kind of military craft like helicopters. Though I was drawn to how interesting it is a lot of the moments are very similar to mine the last few days with the orange lights moing in a traight line.
